This is a demonstration of the complete Roselite workflow:

  1. Bundle - Package this static site into a .veilidpkg format
  2. Publish - Deploy the package to the Veilid DHT network
  3. Gateway - Serve content through HTTP gateway with subdomain routing
  4. Access - Browse the site normally through any web browser

ðŸ”§ Technical Details

Roselite combines:

  • Veilid DHT - Distributed hash table for censorship-resistant storage
  • Gateway Servers - HTTP bridges for standard web browser access
  • Subdomain Routing - Clean URLs like my-site.domain.com
  • Caching Layer - Fast content delivery with fallback support

Unlike traditional hosting, Roselite offers:

  • No single point of failure
  • Resistance to censorship and takedowns
  • Global content distribution
  • Zero hosting fees after initial publication
  • Permanent content availability
